problem_text_cn: 如图,正方形MNEF的四个顶点在直径为4的大圆上,小圆与正方形各边都相切,AB与CD是大圆的直径,AB⊥CD,CD⊥MN,则图中阴影部分的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the four vertices of the square MNEF are on the large circle with a diameter of N_0, the small circle and the edges of the square are tangent, AB and CD are the diameters of the large circle, AB ⊥ CD, CD ⊥ MN, then the area of the shaded part in the figure is()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB⊥CD,CD⊥MN,∴阴影部分的面积恰好为正方形MNEF外接圆面积的\frac{1}{4},∵正方形MNEF的四个顶点在直径为4的大圆上,∴S_{阴影}=\frac{1}{4}π×(\frac{4}{2})²=π．故选:D．
